subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The financially stricken Spanish club Real Oviedo says the Mexican tycoon Carlos Slim has agreed to invest $2.5 million in the third-tier team, which had been facing bankruptcy.
snippet: The financially stricken Spanish club Real Oviedo says the Mexican tycoon Carlos Slim has agreed to invest $2.5 million in the third-tier team, which had been facing bankruptcy.
